name: Booker T. Jones
description: '''Booker Taliaferro Jones Jr.''' (born November 12, 1944) is an American musician, songwriter, record producer and arranger, best known as the frontman of the band [[Booker T. & the M.G.'s]]. He has also worked in the studios with many well-known artists of the 20th and 21st centuries, earning him a [[Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award|Grammy Award for Lifetime Achievement.]]
